name: Random Journey
description: Random Journey - the game about fighting with your opponents for gold by selecting random plates. Neither player nor his opponent have any information about what is hiding behind those plates. You can rely on your intuition or luck only.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 Ghz or similar Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 470 or similar DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated or higher
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
